languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Слухи на корабле{/d} распространяются быстрее пожара, не так ли, шерин?" {n}Улыбаясь нарочито широко, Джай вырисовывает в воздухе знакомые инициалы… и тут же сметает их взмахом ладони.{/n} "Что ж, сердцу не прикажешь. Пусть новая страсть подарит вам столько же тепла и веселья, сколько подарили мне вы".

traits.locale_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Слухи на корабле{/d} распространяются быстрее пожара, не так ли, шерин?" {n}Улыбаясь нарочито широко, Джай вырисовывает в воздухе знакомые инициалы… и тут же сметает их взмахом ладони.{/n} "Что ж, сердцу не прикажешь. Пусть новая страсть подарит вам столько же тепла и веселья, сколько подарили мне вы".

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Rumours spread{/d} faster than fire on a ship, don't they, shereen?" {n}With a deliberately broad smile, Jae draws the familiar initials in the air... then sweeps them away with a wave of her hand.{/n} "Well, the heart wants what it wants. May this new passion bring you as much warmth and fun as you have given me."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Слухи на корабле{/d} распространяются быстрее пожара, не так ли, шерин?" {n}Улыбаясь нарочито широко, Джай вырисовывает в воздухе знакомые инициалы… и тут же сметает их взмахом ладони.{/n} "Что ж, сердцу не прикажешь. Пусть новая страсть подарит вам столько же тепла и веселья, сколько подарили мне вы".

May this new passion bring you as much warmth and fun as you have given me."

May this new passion bring you as much warmth and fun as you have given me."

"{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Rumours spread{/d} faster than fire on a ship, don't they, shereen?" {n}With a deliberately broad smile, Jae draws the familiar initials in the air... then sweeps them away with a wave of her hand.{/n} "Well, the heart wants what it wants. May this new passion bring you as much warmth and fun as you have given me."

languages.text: «{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Los rumores se extienden{/d} más rápido que el fuego en una nave, ¿no, shereen?». {n}Con una sonrisa deliberadamente amplia, Jae escribe en el aire unas iniciales familiares... para después borrarlas con un movimiento de su mano.{/n} «Bueno, no se puede controlar el corazón. Que esta nueva pasión le otorgue tanta calidez y diversión como la que me proporcionó a mí».
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Rumours spread{/d} faster than fire on a ship, don't they, shereen?" {n}With a deliberately broad smile, Jae draws the familiar initials in the air... then sweeps them away with a wave of her hand.{/n} "Well, the heart wants what it wants. May this new passion bring you as much warmth and fun as you have given me."

languages.text: 「船では{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}噂の広がる速度{/d}は火よりも早い、そうでしょう、シャリーン？」{n}ジェイはわざとらしく満面の笑みを浮かべつつ、見慣れたイニシャルを空中に書き…手を振ってそれを払う。{/n}「まあ、心は欲しいものを求める。この新たな情熱が、あんたがあたしに与えてくれたのと同じくらい、あんたにも温かさや楽しさをもたらせばいいのだけれど」
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Rumours spread{/d} faster than fire on a ship, don't they, shereen?" {n}With a deliberately broad smile, Jae draws the familiar initials in the air... then sweeps them away with a wave of her hand.{/n} "Well, the heart wants what it wants. May this new passion bring you as much warmth and fun as you have given me."

traits.locale_text: 「船では{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}噂の広がる速度{/d}は火よりも早い、そうでしょう、シャリーン？」{n}ジェイはわざとらしく満面の笑みを浮かべつつ、見慣れたイニシャルを空中に書き…手を振ってそれを払う。{/n}「まあ、心は欲しいものを求める。この新たな情熱が、あんたがあたしに与えてくれたのと同じくらい、あんたにも温かさや楽しさをもたらせばいいのだけれど」

languages.text: “在这艘船上，{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}流言蔓延{/d}的速度比火灾还要快，是吧，亲爱的？”{n}婕伊故作开心，对你露出了灿烂的笑容，用手在空中划出了你熟悉的名字……之后挥了挥手，将这一切一扫而空。{/n}“好吧，心之所向是没法强求的。但愿这段新的激情能为你带来温暖与快乐，就像你曾带给我温暖与快乐那样。”
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Rumours spread{/d} faster than fire on a ship, don't they, shereen?" {n}With a deliberately broad smile, Jae draws the familiar initials in the air... then sweeps them away with a wave of her hand.{/n} "Well, the heart wants what it wants. May this new passion bring you as much warmth and fun as you have given me."

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Gerüchte verbreiten{/d} sich auf einem Schiff wie ein Lauffeuer, nicht wahr, Shereen?" {n}Mit einem betont breiten Lächeln zeichnet Jae die vertrauten Initialen in die Luft ... ehe sie sie mit ihrer Hand wegwischt.{/n} "Tja, das Herz macht, was es will. Möge Euch diese neue Leidenschaft ebenso viel Wärme und Spaß bringen, wie Ihr mir gegeben habt."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Rumours spread{/d} faster than fire on a ship, don't they, shereen?" {n}With a deliberately broad smile, Jae draws the familiar initials in the air... then sweeps them away with a wave of her hand.{/n} "Well, the heart wants what it wants. May this new passion bring you as much warmth and fun as you have given me."

languages.text: « À bord d'un vaisseau, {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}les rumeurs se propagent{/d} plus vite qu'un incendie, n'est-ce pas, shereen ? » {n}Avec un sourire exagéré, Jae dessine les initiales familières dans les airs... puis les balaie d'un revers de la main.{/n} « Enfin, le cœur a ses raisons que la raison ignore. Puisse cette nouvelle passion vous apporter autant de chaleur et de plaisir que vous m'en avez donné. »
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Rumours spread{/d} faster than fire on a ship, don't they, shereen?" {n}With a deliberately broad smile, Jae draws the familiar initials in the air... then sweeps them away with a wave of her hand.{/n} "Well, the heart wants what it wants. May this new passion bring you as much warmth and fun as you have given me."

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Söylentiler{/d}, gemide çıkacak bir yangından çok daha hızlı yayılıyor, değil mi şirinim?" {n}İnadına kocaman bir gülümsemeyle bakan Jae, havaya aşina olduğun harfler çiziyor... Ardından elini sallayarak hepsini siliyor.{/n} "Tabii ki gönül ferman dinlemez. Bu yeni tutkun, sana da bana sunduğun tüm o sıcaklık ve neşeyi versin."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Rumours spread{/d} faster than fire on a ship, don't they, shereen?" {n}With a deliberately broad smile, Jae draws the familiar initials in the air... then sweeps them away with a wave of her hand.{/n} "Well, the heart wants what it wants. May this new passion bring you as much warmth and fun as you have given me."
